text: In taxonomy, Oceanibulbus is a genus of the Rhodobacteraceae.See the NCBI webpage on Oceanibulbus. Data extracted from the Up to now there is only one species of this genus known (Oceanibulbus indolifex).LPSN lpsn.dsmz.de ==References== ==Further reading== ===Scientific journals=== * ===Scientific books=== * ===Scientific databases=== ==External links== Category:Rhodobacteraceae Category:Bacteria genera Category:Monotypic bacteria genera
